author: UltPanda
name: V2Poll
short: Create interactive polls using Discord Components V2
description: A feature-rich poll system that utilizes Discord's Components V2 to create interactive polls with real-time voting and results.
install_msg: Thanks for installing V2Poll! Use `[p]poll create` to create your first interactive poll. Note that this cog requires Discord.py with Components V2 support.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user IDs for tracking poll votes. This data is deleted when polls expire or are manually deleted.
